summary: Success often involves having a well-thought-out plan to gain an advantage over competitors.
Achieving goals may sometimes involve using underhanded or secretive methods to undermine others.

keyphrase: The importance of timing in executing plans
summary: The effectiveness of a strategy can depend heavily on the timing of its execution.
The pursuit of victory can raise questions about the morality of the tactics used.
Disclosing sensitive information can have significant consequences for all parties involved.
